a:authorAction.a:name: Insert/Change taxonomic tag
a:authorAction.a:description: Tag the selected words as an instance of a taxonomic class

a:arguments.a:argument: <name xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0" type="${ask('Select tag', combobox, (${xpath_eval(string-join(for $cat in //taxonomy[@xml:id eq 'object']//category return concat("'#", $cat/@xml:id, "':'", $cat/*:catDesc[1], "'"), ';'))}), '')}"/>
